summary: Implements the W‑Transducer loss, a modified RNN‑Transducer loss that tolerates missing text at the start or end of an utterance. The class encapsulates grid and schema data needed for loss computation and provides a forward helper to calculate the loss while keeping compatibility with standard RNN‑T decoding.
business_intent: Enable training of speech recognition models using RNN‑Transducer architecture on datasets where transcript boundaries may be incomplete, improving robustness and reducing preprocessing constraints without altering the inference pipeline.
